h2_title: Pale-Axe Stalwart Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Pale-Axe Stalwart
The Pale-Axe Stalwart is a Character boss you'll go up against at the start of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. After defeating the imposing Stalwart, you'll be asked to complete a side quest for him.
## Pale-Axe Stalwart Boss Fight and Guide

He uses a huge axe, so most of his attacks are slow swings. The main approach to this fight should be to dodge the slow attacks, then immediately follow up with a combo as he takes time to recover.

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," specifically during the boss fight against the Pale-Axe Stalwart in Chapter 5. This visual emphasizes the menacing nature of the Pale-Axe Stalwart and sets the tone for the challenging battle described in the guide. The image serves to illustrate the boss's imposing presence and the hazardous setting of the fight.
